pages.text: kya meri aayate tumhaare saamne tilaawath nahi ki jaati thi? phir bhi tum unhe jhutlaate thein
kahenge ke aye parvardigaar! hamaari badh-baqti hum par ghaalib aa gayi (waaqeyi) hum thein hee gumraah
aye hamaare parvardigaar hamein yahaan se najaath de, agar ab bhi hum aisa hee kare, to beshak hum zaalim hai
Allah ta’ala farmaayega, phit kaare hoye yaheen pade raho aur mujh se kalaam na karo
mere bandho ki ek jamaath thi jo baraabar yahi kehti rahi ke aye hamaare parvardigaar! hum imaan la chuke hai, tu hamein baqsh aur hum par rahem farma, tu sab meherbaano se zyaada meherbaan hai
(lekin) tum unhe mazaaq mein hee udaate rahe yahaan tak ke (is mashghale ne) tum ko meri yaad (bhi) bhula di aur tum un se mazaaq hee karte rahe
main ne aaj unhe un ke us sabr ka badhla de diya hai, ke wo qaatir qaah apni muraad ko pahonch chuke hai
Allah ta’ala daryaafth farmayega ke tum zameen mein ba-etebaar barso ki ginti ke, kis qadar rahe
wo kahenge ek din ya ek din se bhi kam, ginti ginne waalo se bhi poch li jiye
Allah ta’ala farmayega fi l waaqe tum wahaa bahuth hee kam rahe ho, aye kaash ke tum ose pehle hee se jaan lete
kya tum ye gumaan kiye hoye ho ke hum ne tumhe yo hee bekaar paida kiya hai aur ye ke tum hamaari taraf lautaaye hee na jaoge
Allah ta’ala saccha baadshah hai, wo badi bulandi waala hai, us ke siva koyi maboodh nahi, wahi buzrug arsh ka maalik hai
jo shaqs Allah ke saath kisi dosre maboodh ko pukaare jis ki koyi daleel us ke paas nahi, pas us ka hisaab to us ke rab ke upar hee hai, beshak kaafir log najaath se mehroom hai
aur kaho ke aye mere rab! tu baqsh aur rahem kar aur tu sab meherbaano se behtar meherbaani karne waala hai
